markdownRemark.html:
Where I started

Tiger Woods. He has a great logo with my initials. Don't copy that.

Then, I drew some logos, wrote out my initials, signed the page with my initials, signed it with my full signature. Altered all that and tried again.

Turns out: My name does not belong on a bottle of cologne yet.

Middle of the Road Idea

When signing my initials, I often make a 7 and then follow it with a half baked W, more like a /. That transformed into 7/.

This turned into making sure // was in my logo and if I could accommodate :// all the better.

The lowercase t in it's negative space creates a colon. An uppercase W contains the //.

Final Design

t//.

frontmatter.title: My Logo
frontmatter.description: It's been a while since I made a logo.
